newsitem.title: ROMANIA: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.
newsitem.headline: RADIO ROMANIA AFTERNOON HEADLINES AT 1 PM.

text.p: * Romania's government started a new round of talks with trade unions about social protections measures.
Prime Minister Victor Ciorbea will announce next Monday the reforms and social protection measures, state radio said.
Government sources said negociations with international lending institutions would end very soon.
* The government will submit up 80 bills to parliament, Senate chairman Petre Roman told a news confernce.
He said an important share of new credits which Bucharest seeks from international lenders are conditional on bringing domestic legislation in line with international standards.
* The lower chamber of Deputies adopted new traffic code.
